function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'main'?
loop_reachability: Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i < 2' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'i < 2' always executed?
Is it possible that the loop with condition 'chars[i][j]' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'chars[i][j]' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < 2' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'chars[i][j]' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'argc' affect subsequent computations?
Does the value assigned to 'argv' affect subsequent computations?
liveness: Does variable 'argc' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
Does variable 'i' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
